alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued May 31 at 12:14PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a Hydrologic Outlook for the following rivers... Pottawatomie Creek at Lane This hydrologic outlook is based on the forecast rainfall for the next 24 hours and estimated runoff from earlier rainfall. Crests may vary if actual rainfall or runoff is greater or less than anticipated. Location: Pottawatomie Creek at Lane Flood stage: 23.0 feet Latest stage: 13.9 feet at 1130 AM Tuesday Maximum Forecast Stage: 23.5 feet at 7 AM Wednesday Jun 01 Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Wed 1pm 1am 1pm Pottawatomie Creek Lane 23.0 13.9 Tue 11am 16.5 23.4 23.4 Later statements, possibly warnings, may be issued as additional information becomes available.
